body.foreign: <fo:block xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" border="solid 1pt red" space-before="5mm" xmlns:axf="http://www.antennahouse.com/names/XSL/Extensions"> <axf:form external-destination="http://xwww.antenna.co.jp/form-test.cgi" field-submit-method="post" field-submit-coordinates="true"> <fo:block>ListBox 1: <axf:form-field field-type="listbox" field-name="listbox1" field-top-index="1" field-multiple="false" width="10em" height="25mm" background-color="#ff8" border="1pt silver inset" > <axf:form-field-option field-value="M">MasterCard</axf:form-field-option> <axf:form-field-option field-value="V">Visa</axf:form-field-option> <axf:form-field-option field-value="A">AMEX</axf:form-field-option> </axf:form-field> </fo:block> </axf:form> </fo:block>
